content:
Our weekly podcast on the innovations, discoveries and gadgetry making the news

KENNETH CUKIER takes a look at what it means to be human. He speaks to leading scientists, doctors and philosophers to ask if ethics and regulations are able to keep up with the technology of genetic engineering. 

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify  | Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
adj. 伦理的；道德的（等于ethical）

wp.social ethic: 社会道德规范;社会道德

eg2: In football, that does seem to be the prevailing .
这似乎已经成为了足球界盛行的道德规范了。
“In each nation, she will emphasize Africa as a place of opportunity, built on the  of responsibility,” Kelly said.
凯利说：“她将在到访每个国家时强调非洲是建立在道德责任基础上的机会之地。
In The Castle that surrender to the everyday becomes an .
《城堡》，屈服于每日的生活成了一种道德准则。

ex: 网络 小机件；小配件；小玩意儿
eg2: His desk is covered with electronic gadgetry.
他的书桌上摆满了各种电子玩意儿。

wp.genetic counseling: 遗传咨询;遗传谘询;基因遗传咨询;遗传征询
wp.Genetic Programming: 遗传编程;遗传规划;基因规划
wp.genetic polymorphism: 遗传多态性;基因多态性;遗传性多态现象;遗传多样性
wp.Genetic carrier: 带原者;遗传载体;遗传携带者;基因载体
wp.Genetic Structure: 遗传结构;基因结构;遗传构造
wp.genetic mutation: 基因突变;基因渐变;遗传突变;基因图谱
wp.genetic disorder: 遗传性疾病;遗传病;遗传性障碍;遗传缺陷
wp.genetic algorithms: 遗传算法;遗传演算法;柔性分析模型;基因演算法

ex: adj. 遗传的；基因的；起源的
eg2: So what is the genetic algorithm?
那么什么是遗传算法呢？
The extent to which genes are to blame varies, but for those with the worst vision, around 80% of the condition is caused by genetic factors.
在多大程度上归咎于基因并不一定，但是对于那些视力最差的人来说，80%的情况下是由遗传因子导致的。
One biologist developed a formula for how much genetic material would have to be to saved in the act of altruism for it to be worthwhile.
一位生物学家发展了一套公式，用来计算到底有多少遗传物质可以被保留下来的时候，利他的行为才是值得的。

ex: n. 哲学家；深思的人；善于思考的人
网络 哲人；思想家；学者
eg2: 希腊哲学家亚里士多德
He seems to be a bit of a philosopher.

Title: The future of genetic engineering
